\documentclass[12pt]{book}

% Center section numbers.
\usepackage{sectsty}
\chapterfont{\centering}
\sectionfont{\centering}

\linespread{1.3}

\usepackage{ifthen}
\newcommand{\mymarks}{%
\ifthenelse{\equal{\leftmark}{\rightmark}}
{\rightmark} % if equal
{\rightmark--\leftmark}} % if not equal 

\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\fancyhead[LO,RE,C]{}
\fancyhead[RO,LE]{\mymarks}
\fancyfoot{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\renewcommand{\chaptermark}[1]{}
\renewcommand{\sectionmark}[1]{\markboth{#1}{#1}}
\renewcommand{\headheight}{15pt}

\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{colorlinks=false}

\usepackage{titling}

\include{titles}
\begin{document}
\maketitle
\include{content}
\end{document}
